compliant.section: Nuvoton and its business partners may use these types of Cookies to deliver advertisements and communications relevant to your interests and to measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation: Data processing must be limited to specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes.

compliant.section: These Cookies can remember that your device has visited a site or service
compliant.legal provisions: Fairness and transparency: Users should be informed about the use of cookies and their purpose.

compliant.section: may be able to track your deviceâ€™s browsing activity on other sites or services other than NUVOTON Website(s).
compliant.legal provisions: Consent: Clear and affirmative consent is required for processing data related to tracking users across websites.

non_compliant.section: This Information may be shared with a third party, such as advertisers and/or advertising networks to deliver the advertising, and to help measure the effectiveness of an advertising campaign.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization and Transparency: Data sharing should be limited to what is necessary and users should be informed about the recipients of their data.
non_compliant.amend: Nuvoton should clearly identify all third parties with whom data is shared and specify the purpose of sharing. They should also provide users with an easy way to access information about these third parties.
